game.name: Fuel Me Up
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 창작마당, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 레벨 에디터 포함, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Fuel Me Up is a shoot ’em up roguelike game. Your ship’s fuel tank is leaking, and you must eliminate the aliens that have invaded planet Vorthex. Earn money by defeating enemy ships, buy upgrades and add-ons, unlock new ships and pilots, and try to get farther each run.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fuel Me Up is a shoot ’em up roguelike game. Your ship’s fuel tank is leaking, and you must eliminate the aliens that have invaded planet Vorthex. Earn money by defeating enemy ships, buy upgrades and add-ons, unlock new ships and pilots, and try to get farther each run.
